Html: The default Source Locations and information is long overdue for an update. For some reason we keep having to deal with old information that does not include things like bindings and current drop information. I work on the filter and most of the information for searching items is based on this old information. Still filtering for things like "Drops from onyxia in" when armory and wowhead no longer report this so vague. Current reports for such items are "Drops from Onyxia in Onyxia's Lair (10/25)" and "Drops from Onyxia in Heroic/Normal Onyxia's Lair". Having a up-to-date source files would make filtering easier, not to mention seriously cut down the amount of time a user has to spend refreshing all the information for there various toons. So if it is not to much to ask for, I vote for a updated Source Files to be in the next patch.
Will do a full refresh of all item data for the next version.
